item.title: Soulver: For all your random calculations
item.description: I often find myself doing random calculations and I used to do so part manually and part using Alfred's calculator until Alistair pointed me at Soulver, a desktop/iPhone/iPad app, which is even better. I thought I'd write some examples of calculations I use it for, partly so I'll remember the syntax in future! Calculating how much memory Neo4j memory mapping will take up 800 mb + 2660mb + 6600mb + 9500mb + 40mb in GB = 19.
